pkgmetadata.longdescription: Additional Themes, Theme Components and Utilities for 'ggplot2' // A compilation of extra 'ggplot2' themes, scales and utilities, including a spell check function for plot label fields and an overall emphasis on typography. A copy of the 'Google' font 'Roboto Condensed' https://github.com/google/roboto/ is also included along with a copy of the 'IBM' 'Plex Sans' https://github.com/IBM/type and 'Titillium Web' https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Titillium+Web fonts are also included to support their respective typography- oriented themes.
